description: Repdigit - 1 is prime (next term is 88...8 (72 digits)).
comments: Corresponding values of primes are in A096843. - _Jaroslav Krizek_, Mar 19 2013.
prog: (PARI) u=30; for(n=1, u, r=(10^n-1)/9; for(a=1, 9, m=r*a; if(ispseudoprime(m-1), print1(m, ", ")))) \\ _Felix Fr√∂hlich_, Jul 07 2014
author: _Patrick De Geest_
extensions: Offset corrected and initial term added by Arkadiusz Wesolowski, Aug 14 2011
